core.tut.pori.dao

Class SQLSelectBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • core.tut.pori.dao.SQLSelectBuilder

  • public class SQLSelectBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper class, which can be used to build an SQL SELECT clause.
